resources.string: Rammstein was created by Till Lindemann.
The author of Rammstein\'s lyrics is Christian Lorenz.
The band\'s first album is called Herzeleid.
This line \" Und die Welt z√§hlt laut bis zehn \" belongs to song Sonne.
The song Klavier is not in the Rammstein repertoire.
All the band members were born in GDR.
The album cover of Mutter depicts an icebreaker.
The album Mutter was released in 2001.
The DVD released by the band in 1999 is called \" Live aus Berlin \".
